vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.13.9;
son of: Raphu (H7505)
§ Palti or Phalti = "my deliverance"
1) son of Raphu, the spy chosen from the tribe of Benjamin
2) son of Laish, the man to whom king Saul gave his daughter Michal in marriage even though she was already married to David
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Rafú; espía; tribu de Benjamín; (b) פַּלְטִיאֵל   hijo de Lais; (c)   habitante de Pélet
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
帕提 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "我的拯救"
1) 拉孚的兒子, 是由便雅憫支派中選出來去刺探迦南地的人 (民 13:9)
2) 米甲的第二任丈夫 #撒上 25:44|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
帕提 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "我的拯救"
1) 拉孚的儿子, 是由便雅悯支派中选出来去刺探迦南地的人 (民 13:9)
2) 米甲的第二任丈夫 #撒上 25:44|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.25.44;
son of: Laish (H3889); married to Michal (H4324); also called Paltiel at 2Sa.3.15;
Also named: pal.ti.el (פַּלְטִיאֵל "Paltiel" H6409H)
§ Palti or Phalti = "my deliverance"
1) son of Raphu, the spy chosen from the tribe of Benjamin
2) son of Laish, the man to whom king Saul gave his daughter Michal in marriage even though she was already married to David
